definition: policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy

sentences.english: McDonald's and KFC use this kind of international business strategy to make their profit.
sentences.chinese: 麥當勞和肯得及就是利用這種國際化策略來盈利的。

sentences.english: When finished with the list, click OK then close out of Local Group Policy Editor.
sentences.chinese: 完成列表後，點擊確定並關閉本地組策略編輯器。

sentences.english: The first part introduces the outline of our traffic developing in Changde.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分爲常德市交通違法的防控策略。

sentences.english: Intents express abstract, high-level policy requirements.
sentences.chinese: 意圖表達抽象的高級策略需求。

sentences.english: These strategies include buying raw materials in bulk and by mechanizing their operations.
sentences.chinese: 這些策略包括購買原材料和散裝機械化經營。

sentences.english: Xiao Cai sheds light on the realities of pricing at Guanghua Market.
sentences.chinese: 小蔡一語道破光華商家的訂價策略。

sentences.english: Dr. Fang knows very well about this strategy.
sentences.chinese: 方博士很明白這條策略。

sentences.english: Once we eliminated the idea that we were converting to Six Sigma, there was much more acceptance of it.
sentences.chinese: 一旦屏棄採用六西格瑪策略，我們更容易接受它。

sentences.english: High-level security policies are documents in manual or digital format.
sentences.chinese: 高級安全策略是硬拷貝或數字格式的文檔。

sentences.english: But below are the six basic elements you hope to include in your strategy.
sentences.chinese: 但是下面六個基本要素你或許希望包括在你的策略裏。

sentences.english: Blow-up", a Discussional Basis for "Contemporary Arts"
sentences.chinese: “放大”，作爲一種策略的“當代藝術”討論的基點。

sentences.english: In this article we provide you with some common sense guidelines for setting your own portal governance strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本文將向您介紹設置門戶管理策略的一些常識性指南。

sentences.english: This paper takes Hongta Company as target, research their marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本文以紅塔公司爲對象，對其營銷策略進行研究。

sentences.english: The strategies of conservation of Liriodendron were also discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還探討了鵝掌楸屬種質資源的保護策略。

sentences.english: This is a common strategy among pros who have a lot of experience and iron discipline.
sentences.chinese: 這是有經驗，有鐵的紀律的專業人士常用的策略。

sentences.english: Decoupling of interface protocols from an implementation strategy.
sentences.chinese: 接口協議和實現策略之間的解耦。

definition: to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)/to take
important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
